title: Crofter's pie with whisky cream sauce
ingredients: ['1 large swede or turnip, peeled and chopped', '2 large carrots, peeled and chopped', '1 medium sized sweet potato, peeled and chopped', '1 tablespoon creme fraiche or fromage frais', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '8 large potatoes, Maris Piper or similar, peeled and chopped', '150ml milk', '50g butter', '450g traditional or vegetarian haggis', '400ml beef stock', '100ml whisky', '200ml double cream', '1 splash Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar']
